scripts.upload-ui: aws s3 cp ui/dist s3://carolyns-website/ --recursive --profile personal
scripts.package-cloudformation: aws cloudformation package --template ./deployment.yml --s3-bucket carolyns-website-deployments --output-template packaged-sam.yml --profile personal
scripts.deploy-cloudformation: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file packaged-sam.yml --stack-name carolyns-website --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --profile personal
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy-cloudformation && npm run upload-ui
